body_html:
Ok, but as I wrote, this is anyway stochastic, and I doubt that it depends on the particular GPU model, and I wrote already about OS and TF version.

  • CUDA/cuDNN version: CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN 5.1
  • GPU model and memory: GeForce GTX 680, 4036MiB

body:
Ok, but as I wrote, this is anyway stochastic, and I doubt that it depends on the particular GPU model, and I wrote already about OS and TF version.

- **CUDA/cuDNN version**: CUDA 8.0 and cuDNN 5.1
- **GPU model and memory**: GeForce GTX 680, 4036MiB
